Condition 19 of planning permission 21/03821/KPSID is amended as follows:Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, the drainage system as identified in the drawings and documents below shall be implemented in full and permanently maintained thereafter.o	Drainage Management Plan (Shockledge, June 2023)o	Flood Risk Assessment & Surface Water Drainage Strategy (Shockledge June 2023) o	SUDS proforma o	Proposed Below Ground Drainage Layout Plan Drawing 010100 PO8 o	Surface Water and Foul Water Manhole Scheduleo	Below Ground Drainage Construction Details Sheet 1o	Below Ground Drainage Construction Details Sheet 2o	Below Ground Drainage Construction Details Sheet 3o	Below Ground Drainage Construction Details Sheet 4o	Below Ground Drainage Construction Details Sheet 5o	54CA07-SHK-ZZ-00-DR-C-010101    Flood Exceedance Route Plan      Revision P01Reason: To prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, in accordance with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission 21/03821/KPSID (Demolition of the existing CLASP building and the erection of a new 3 storey teaching block and adjoining sports hall to facilitate a 5 FE junior school, external works to the existing outdoor school playing areas, 2 no. Multi Use Games Areas (MUGA) (including one floodlit), new junior playground area, reconfiguration of internal access, new staff car parking area and cycle parking, works to the existing Victorian Block, new pedestrian access points, a new covered link, landscaping and other associated works. The school will be subject to a Community Use Agreement.) to allow amendment in Condition 1(Approved Plan)and 19 (Detailed Drainage Design)  including changes to landscape levels, a pumped SW solution, foul water pumping to the Victorian block and other associated works.
